phrases: In a pig's ass!
I was wrong about you, traitor!
Richie, wait!
Listen to me!
Do not touch me!
I do not want to listen to you!
I do not need you anymore.
What should I do?
I forget what I was like before I met you
The wind caresses my cheek
JLullaby of BirdlandJ
Kick my heels going down the slope
As my worthless shadow grows
It is like an endless summer vacation
Feels like sneakin' into the swimming pool
Hey, let us swim with our clothes on, jump in!!
A shocking seductive spiral
This beat that pierces my heart is strange
(It flares up, then vanishes)
Every miserable day is swell,
dress it up
A high-speed swing surrounds us
(What is this dance called?
I cannot stop)
Do not you go, it is twined around my ears
and will not leave me ever again
This melody...
My feet feel heavy.
It is just like the first time I climbed this slope...
Kaoru-san...
Would you like to have this onigiri?
Why?
I am fine.
I am already stuffed.
Just eating half a thing of bread is not enough to give you energy.
Then I will have just one...
This is good.
What is in it?
Let us see...
Clams boiled in soy sauce...
I should not have said that!
I am such an idiot!
Me and my big mouth!
Say, Ri-chan, I cannot help but notice
that you are on really good terms with Nishimi-san lately!
Tell me the truth, are you two going steady?
N-No!
Look at her, she is blushing!
You do not have to hide it from us!
We are in your corner!
But we are not...
YOU-Um...
Honestly... we are not dating.
Mukae-san and I... are just friends.
So... please do not get the wrong idea.
Crap.
What did I butt in for...?
This is a surprise...
Nishimi-san, you hardly ever talk and I had you pegged as unapproachable.
For a second there, I could have sworn you were going to blow your stack at us.
M-Me too...
Hey, tell us something.
What is the trick to getting good scores on tests?
Yeah, I wanted to ask the same thing.
Oh, I do not...
Oh, we have put him on the spot...
Huh?
What do you know?
I do not feel sick at all...
Hey, Richie...
Do not ignore me!
Would you just listen to me, you blockhead?!
Wow, what a pad, Yamaoka-kun!
And set apart from your house...
This is where we are going to practice every day from now on!
Huh?
Kawabuchi-kun, you look kind of glum.
Do not tell me you are having second thoughts?
Do not be stupid.
Once I decide I am going to do something, I see it through.
That is the way to be.
We better hurry up an' decide what songs we are going to do.
What is it going to be?
Well, I want to get the Spiders in there.
And the Ventures, of course.
And then...
Hey, what about the Beatles?!
What is with all the different genres?
I think the girls will dig it more if we play a variety.
That is not what you said before!
Ryunosuke...
We just got a roll cake.
Why do not you share it with your friends?
Mama!
Do not bug us!
We would love to have some roll cake, Madam.
Let us discuss this over a snack, okay, Ryunosuke-kun?
Kawabuchi-kun, are not you coming?
Nah.
I am going to stay here an' practice a little by myself.
Oh...
Pops...
What are you doing wearin' a tie on a hot day like today?
Oh... I am in mourning.
For who?
John Coltrane.
C-Coltrane died?!
You did not know?
Well, I guess it is only natural
that a rock and roller would not get word of it...
Please do not bust my chops about that, Pops.
That aside, have a look in the shop.
There is a beauty girl in there I have seen around before.
Y-Yurika-san...?
Oh my.
I have not seen you in a while, Sentaro-kun...
I heard that you are going to be in a rock band for the school festival.
I am looking forward to it.
Yurika-san... Chet Baker...
If you are interested, want to hear it?
Sentaro-kun... I...
Please... do not say anythin'.
I cannot...
Because... I...
W-Who is down there?!
Oh, sorry.
Did not mean to interrupt, Sen-boy.
Brother... June..?
Do not pay no attention to me.
Go on with what you were doing.
Dammit!
I forgot to tell him about Junichi!
Yurika-san!
Hey, Sen-boy.
Your woman forgot something.
Sen!
That packed quite a wallop...
What are you lookin' at me like that for?
You are not satisfied with one punch?
Wait, Sen. Junichi has had kind of a breakdown...
Brother June..?
What is wrong?
Tell me, what happened?
Sentaro...
Sentaro, wait!
Okay, everyone...
I would like to decide on the members of the committee for the festival.
I am open to volunteers or nominations...
Okay!
Then I nominate Nishimi-san and Mukae-san!
I am sure those two would take responsibility and do a good job!
I think that is a good idea, too!
No objections here!
East High School Festival Talent Show Sign-Up Reception
Oh, the brass band...
Could you write down the representatives' names and program?
Um, could I have an application form?
Here you are.
You are good to go!
I am sorry, Kaoru-san.
The new term's just begun and you have been saddled with this busy job.
Actually... since I was always transferring from school to school,
I never had the chance to take on a responsibility like this.
It is more fun than I thought.
Kaoru-san, have you talked to Sentaro recently?
No.
Then... you would not know about it.
The other day at the shop, Sentaro punched Brother June
I did not see it myself, and I do not know what it was about...
Could you two bring the completed applications to the student council office?
Sure.
I will do it.
Kaoru-san, stay here at the reception desk.
Okay.
Oh, Ri'ko, good timing.
You are on the committee, right?
Do me a favor an' copy this info onto the application, would ya?
Forget it!
The reception desk is in the materials room.
Go over there and fill out the form yourself.
I cannot accept a scrap of paper.
Fill out a form.
Did he really hit Brother Jun?
Is he taking it all on himself and suffering in silence?
Hey...
That band name...
In katakana it should be spelled
with a Ji, not a Za, for The Olympus.
Za is fine.
No, it is not.
No, that is not what I want to say!
Se...
Excuse me!
Is there still time to sign up?
Yes.
Whew!
Good!
Za Olympus
The Olympus
Somewhere in my heart, there was still a little hurt and regret...
As the festival drew closer, I became busier with my committee duties,
and before I knew it, the distance between me and him had grown.
I even looked back fondly on that silly conversation.
but they seemed so long ago.
18th School Festival
And at last, the day of the festival arrived...
The Olympus is next!
I am going to go to the front!
I cannot wait!
Are you ready, ladies?
Look at him with that smile on his face
Look at him with that smile on his face
Which of the girls now is he going to chase
Kaoru-san...
After this festival is over, you two will be back jamming at my place, right?
Um...
You are not going to watch from inside?
Things are... awkward between me and Sentaro-kun right now.
It is my fault...
I gave in to loneliness... and betrayed him in the worst way.
What the...?
You are on the committee, right?
Follow me!
What happened?
There is suddenly no sound coming from the amps!
No good...
The main electrical system is not down.
Sorry, but could you help look for the because?
We will split up.
Boy, what a bummer, huh?
Hey, second-year!
You cannot do anythin' without electricity, so quit actin' big!
I bet you just wanted to show off your fancy shmancy electric guitars!
Rub your money in our faces!
Why do not you get off the stage?!
Th-That is not what...
Sorry to burst your bubble,
but him an' I are poor and the instruments are borrowed.
He may be a flashy guy, but he is got a real goal,
so I will ask you upperclassmen
to stop interruptin' just to amuse yourselves.
Kawabuchi-kun...
You are actually a nice guy.
I am seeing you in a new light.
Actually, huh?
I am always nice!
Ow!
Y-Yes, of course, of course!
B-But I really am surprised.
I never thought you would join the band...
Yeah.
I was going to refuse at first.
But I changed my mind after Matsuoka told me
he wanted to become a star so he could support his parents and brothers.
I know how it feels to desperately want to be useful to your family.
YOU-Um... Kawabuchi-kun, would you consider staying with the band?
Nah.
This was a one-shot deal for me.
Jazz is more up my alley.
Besides...
I am keeping my important partner waiting.
They cannot fix it, huh?
Guess I will go...
No, do not leave!
Wait!
Wait!
Please!
Do not panic.
I will keep them occupied for a little while.
You be ready to go on as soon as the problem's fixed.
What is he doing all of a sudden?
He is wearing an armband, so he must be on the committee...
This song...
Can we get it all back?
Hey, what is going on?!
Kawabuchi-kun...
But... it sounds totally different than it did then...
It is like two princes arguing good-naturedly as they come back home...
Richie!
What the heck?!
They are running away?!
Cool...
My body feels light...
It is as if I have been born again...
I feel... like I have got wings on my feet...
I waited for you on that slope
For our after school promise
There was a'goodbye' blurred far away
I was so weak, so awkward, and so fragile back then
But you gave me a small pair of wings
In the twilight hour of the sky,
I am searching for a gleam of light
If only I could have said that I love you
The note that I wrote in the corner of my textbook
has never been delivered to this day
